message: I would like to go however.

So Hammer and Nez had the brilliant idea of trying to get a few people together for a weekend in Vegas.  Splee's 30th birthday is coming up, so what better time?  I'd love to hear who would be able to make it and what you guys think.  This would be the weekend of October 1st.  YOU KNOW YOU WANT THIS!
i want it. can i do it? questions questions..
I missed the last vegas trip due to girlfriend at the time. I should have gone! So i suppose no missing this one
Yes you can.
i cant go :(
Yes you can.  Let's hear your excuse.
Same, the earlier things get planned then better for me.
yeah deets please, sooner the better as for to be getting everything scheduled and get certain things lined up that are hard to line up....
Money, and I will be in school around then...
Come on, Driz.  Someone will let you sleep on the floor of their hotel room, all you need is a plane ticket and some booze money.  You can do it!

My thoughts (depending on if any of Lee's UK friends show up) are we fly into Vegas on 9/30 (Friday) and leave on either Sunday or Monday (10/2-10/3).  Hotel isn't decided yet, but I think we could all stay wherever.
Looking at hotels and there aren't a lot of options for what's affordable and right on the strip.  Circus Circus again?
period
That place looks awesome.
Oh, and we're going to: http://www.insertcoinslv.com/

Wasn't very satisfied with Circus Circus, but honestly Vegas is the kind of place where, if you get on the Strip, it doesn't matter.  we can just meet up anywhere and go crush the city from there.  If the crew picks Circus Circus, I'll just meet up with you at dusk ;)

Frankly I'd like to avoid going outside at all.  It would be more fun if we all stayed in the same place, but I don't know what people's budgets are looking like.  I'm down to stay in a shittier place, cuz I doubt we'll spend much time in the room!
I did some quick pricing. 1 room for 2 people ranges from about $250(Caesars/high end), to $150(Treasure island/Tropicana/flamingo/NYNY) to $75 for the sitty strip hotels(hooters hotel and casino)
prices subject to change obviously, and i only went to hotels.com.
$150 per night i could swing if i had a room mate
oh hell yeah
Though that was the "Average" price. Sat night is probably more expensive than sunday.
Well we're bunking with Lee's brother, so find someone else!  ;)
are any other individuals going? I assume the couples want their own rooms.
super high rollers suite IMO
likes that!

I want to be able to make it out there, will have to see what finances are like closer to the day. I will also be turning 30 in October, would be awesome to get DL up here, too, for a triple 30 birthday extravaganza!
DL - can you be trusted to not break a limb before this trip?
Would love to join for this, but I may be traveling that weekend, not sure yet.
this thread went way off track in typical tempest fashion. Love it
COCK ROCKET!
Yeah it sucks got family stuff going on for the foreseeable future.
Hopefully I won't but even so I'm not at all in a position to travel at the moment :(
DL nooooooooooo
Someday one of us will actually meet you IRL and prove you're not a robot.
yeah..one of us =)
Just has to come to the wedding, then he sees most of us, right? *stern glare at all*
Set a date yet?

99% done yes, finalizing contracts right now, so it's not 'official" official.  but it's down to like, well, we actually want to pay x instead of y for this item.. then the contract gets rewritten.. etc etc.  then parties review it.. then changes...
when i sign it, i'll let ppl know.
I hope its not during the school year :(
This August or next year?
I figure shame will be a good motivator.  That's how it works, right?
Drizzy has no shame.
I hope its not during the school year :(

depends on when your school starts.  late August.  it's a goddamn saturday.  skip class friday and come over.  you have all semester to catch up.  typically "dude ive known since i was 4 is getting married" is a good excuse to miss a friday early in the semester.
Yeah.  Stop being a pussy, Driz.
next

Driz, making excuses for Vegas I can understand, because that shit is relatively late notice.  You have more than a year to plan for Stre's wedding and you're making excuses already? No wonder we have a "Drizzy Sucks" sign handy whenever we have a group photo together. ;)
Hahaha!

never been a big fan of theirs, actually.  other than TA, which wasn't like OMG.  I figure if I can tell/hear better jokes with the TV off during those films/shows, with  my friends all blazed up, then i'd prefer the truly original content and turn off the set.

Maybe give it another chance.  I mean the beginning isn't the best part.  Unfortunately it's really really dated at this point.
You win.
not my bag i guess
watched that 0.25 times.  turned that shit off immediatly.

Best time.
